detectors.description:
ErcauX._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ErcauX.sol#186-200) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ErcauX.sol#194-197)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ErcauX.sol#198)
